name: Minishmup
description:
A minimalist shmup. Shoot, dash, kill, evade! The game is endless; play for the highest score and share your best in the comments.

Score points by killing enemies. Kill by dashing for even more points.

Controls

Xbox Controller:

MOVE     - left joystick

SHOOT   - X or A

DASH      - B or any shoulder

Keyboard:

MOVE     - arrows or wasd

SHOOT   - Z

DASH      - X
